effect.en: Draw cards until you have 6 cards in your hand.
effect.fr: Piochez jusqu’à ce que vous ayez 6 cartes en main.

effect.en: If you have more Prize cards left than your opponent, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.
effect.fr: S’il vous reste plus de cartes Récompense que votre adversaire, cette attaque inflige 50 dégâts plus 30 dégâts supplémentaires.

description.en: It uses its scaly, rugged body to seal the entrance of its nest and protect its young from predators.
